Package com.se.simplicity.model

The basis for all models in The Simplicity Engine.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BoundingVolume A simple geometric shape that contains the geometry of a subgraph of a SceneGraph.
Model A container for the internal model structure compatible with SceneGraphs.
VertexGroup A portion of (or possibly an entire) Model's vertices.
 

Class Summary
ArrayVG A vertex group based on an array of vertices.
IndexedArrayVG A vertex group based on an indexed array of vertices.
ModelConstants Constants often used by objects that manipulate Models and VertexGroups.
SimpleModel A simple implementation of a Model.
 

Package com.se.simplicity.model Description

The basis for all models in The Simplicity Engine. The concept of a model is expressed as a tree of specialised nodes, each of which is able to contain a vertex group. This method of modelling allows efficiencies in collision detection and rendering as well as the ability to animate. Bounding volumes further increase efficiencies in collision detection and rendering as it allows a quick check against the node to be carried out before performing the more complex task of checking the actual geometry.
